name: Tenant Build-Out Electrical Work
description: Transforming commercial space for new tenants requires electrical expertise. Solomon Electric provides complete tenant build-out electrical services throughout South Florida—from blank shell to move-in ready. We handle power distribution, lighting, outlets, data infrastructure, and specialty systems for retail, office, restaurant, and industrial tenant spaces.
warningSignsSubheading: Quality electrical work is essential for tenant satisfaction and code compliance.

problems.title: Starting from Shell Space
problems.description: Blank commercial shells need complete electrical infrastructure—panels, branch circuits, lighting, outlets. We build from scratch to tenant specifications.

problems.title: Reconfiguring Existing Space
problems.description: Previous tenant electrical may not suit new use. We reconfigure, add, and modify electrical for new tenant requirements.

problems.title: Restaurant/Kitchen Needs
problems.description: Food service requires specific electrical—high-power kitchen equipment, proper circuits, code-compliant installations. We understand restaurant electrical.

problems.title: Office Technology Requirements
problems.description: Modern offices need abundant outlets, data drops, and server room infrastructure. We design for today's technology demands.

problems.title: Permit and Inspection Deadlines
problems.description: Build-outs have schedules. We work within your timeline, handle permits efficiently, and coordinate inspections without delays.

problems.title: Multi-Tenant Coordination
problems.description: Build-outs in occupied buildings require careful coordination. We work with property management and minimize disruption to other tenants.

process.title: Scope Review
process.description: We review architectural plans, understand tenant requirements, and identify all electrical scope—power, lighting, data, specialty systems.

process.title: Design and Estimation
process.description: We design electrical systems meeting tenant needs and code requirements, then provide detailed pricing for your budget planning.

process.title: Permitting
process.description: We prepare permit applications and handle all submissions. Commercial build-outs require permits we're experienced at obtaining.

process.title: Rough-In Installation
process.description: We install conduit, wire, boxes, and panels while walls are open—coordinating with other trades for efficient construction.

process.title: Finish and Commissioning
process.description: We install fixtures, devices, and covers, connect equipment, and verify complete system operation before tenant occupancy.

benefits.title: Schedule Reliability
benefits.description: We understand build-out schedules and what it takes to meet opening deadlines. Electrical delays hold up other trades—we don't delay.

benefits.title: Code Expertise
benefits.description: Commercial build-outs face strict code requirements. We design and install to pass inspection the first time.

benefits.title: Trade Coordination
benefits.description: We work effectively with general contractors and other trades, coordinating rough-in timing and avoiding conflicts.

benefits.title: Complete Capability
benefits.description: From shell to finish, standard outlets to specialized kitchen equipment, data rooms to retail lighting—we handle all aspects.

faqs.question: How early should electrical be involved in build-out planning?
faqs.answer: As early as possible. Electrical decisions affect overall layout, and we can identify potential issues or cost drivers before plans are finalized. Ideally, we review plans during design—not after permit submission.

faqs.question: Can you work from architectural plans or do you design electrical?
faqs.answer: Either approach works. We can work from architect-provided electrical plans or design electrical systems ourselves based on architectural floor plans and tenant requirements. Many build-outs use our design services for electrical-specific expertise.

faqs.question: How long does build-out electrical work take?
faqs.answer: It depends on space size and complexity. Small retail spaces might take 1-2 weeks. Larger restaurant or office build-outs take 3-6 weeks. We provide realistic schedules during estimation and meet committed timelines.

faqs.question: Do you handle permit inspections?
faqs.answer: Yes. We coordinate required inspections, are present when inspectors arrive, and address any concerns. Passing inspection is our responsibility—we don't leave that to you or the GC.

faqs.question: What about IT and data wiring?
faqs.answer: We install data infrastructure—network cable runs, data jacks, server room wiring. We coordinate with tenant's IT vendor for specific requirements. Modern offices typically need data drops at every workstation location.

faqs.question: Can you work nights/weekends to avoid disruption?
faqs.answer: Yes. For build-outs in occupied buildings, we can schedule noisy work during off-hours. For tenant move-in deadlines, we can work extended hours to meet schedules. We accommodate project needs.

faqs.question: Who's responsible if existing building infrastructure is inadequate?
faqs.answer: We identify infrastructure limitations during assessment. If building electrical can't support tenant needs, we'll specify necessary upgrades. Responsibility for building-side upgrades is typically clarified in tenant leases—we work with both parties.

faqs.question: Do you provide warranty on build-out work?
faqs.answer: Yes. Our work includes standard warranty coverage. Equipment and fixtures carry manufacturer warranties. If issues arise after occupancy, we stand behind our work.

seoContent.heading: Tenant Build-Out Electrical in South Florida
seoContent.body: Transforming commercial space for new tenants requires electrical expertise. Solomon Electric provides complete tenant build-out services throughout Miami-Dade and Broward counties—from shell-to-finish electrical for retail, restaurant, office, and industrial tenant spaces.

seoContent.heading: Restaurant and Food Service Build-Outs
seoContent.body: Food service electrical has specific requirements—high-power kitchen equipment, proper circuits for commercial refrigeration and ventilation, and code-compliant installation methods. We understand restaurant electrical needs and build to health department and electrical code requirements.

seoContent.heading: Office and Retail Electrical
seoContent.body: Modern offices need abundant power and data infrastructure. Retail spaces need flexible lighting and adequate capacity for displays and point-of-sale systems. We design and install electrical systems that serve tenant operations effectively.

seoContent.heading: Serving South Florida Commercial Properties
seoContent.body: Solomon Electric provides tenant build-out electrical services throughout Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Boca Raton, and all surrounding commercial areas. From single-tenant spaces to multi-unit developments, we deliver commercial electrical that meets tenant needs and schedules.

imageAlt: Tenant Build-Out Electrical Work service provided by licensed electricians in South Florida
